alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 10:54PM CDT until May 02 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... West central Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Damon to 6 miles south of Snow, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Talihina... Rattan... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Talimena State Park... Higgins... Damon... Snow... Bengal... Tuskahoma... Yanush... Stanley... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Oleta... Cloudy... Corinne... Gowen... Sardis... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
